colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(ZHES BYANG PHYOGS KYI SA MTHAR SKYES PA'I BAN CHUNG MKHAS GRUB ZER BAS SKYE 'GRO'I SPYOD TSUL DANG BSTAN PA'I GNAS TSUL GYI NYAMS DANG SBYAR TE BRIS PA RANG NYID BYA ROG DKAR POR SGRUB STE 'DZAM GLING PA RNAMS DANG 'GRAS 'DOD PA MA YIN GYI, SKAL MNYAM 'GA' ZHIG LA'ANG PHAN PA'I SKABS SRID DAM SNYAM PA YIN PAS KHYED 'GA' ZHIG GE THUGS LA PHOG TSE BZOD PA'I PHAN YON DRAN PAR ZHU ZHU, ,DIS KYANG RGYAL BSTAN RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
